info.name: Heroes
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

response.body: [{"id":1,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"0/5","name":"POOR"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":2,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"0/5","name":"POOR"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":3,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"0/5","name":"POOR"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":4,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"1/5","name":"TYPICAL"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":5,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"1/5","name":"TYPICAL"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":6,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"1/5","name":"TYPICAL"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":7,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"2/5","name":"GOOD"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":8,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"2/5","name":"GOOD"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":9,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"2/5","name":"GOOD"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":10,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"3/5","name":"EXCELLENT"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":11,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"3/5","name":"EXCELLENT"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":12,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"3/5","name":"EXCELLENT"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":13,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"4/5","name":"INCREDIBLE"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":14,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"4/5","name":"INCREDIBLE"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":15,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"4/5","name":"INCREDIBLE"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":16,"name":"Superhuman Strength","level":{"power":"5/5","name":"AMAZING"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":17,"name":"Flight","level":{"power":"5/5","name":"AMAZING"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "},{"id":18,"name":"Early Warning","level":{"power":"5/5","name":"AMAZING"},"description":"This fictional hero has extraordinary powers to use in his fight against crime and evil. "}]
